title: Three suffer gunshot wounds in Okaloosa County shooting
content:
FORT WALTON BEACH, Fla. (WEAR) — The Okaloosa County Sheriff's Office (OCSO) is investigating a shooting near Fort Walton Beach.
Authorities said the incident looks to be drug-related.
Three people suffered from nonlife-threatening gunshot wounds, two of the victims are 21-year-old males and the other is a 16-year-old female.
Authorities were called to Landview Drive around 2:26 a.m. Thursday morning in response to a shots fired call. Witnesses said they heard multiple gunshots outside the apartments and a female screaming.
The girl with the gunshot wound was found at the scene and taken to Fort Walton Beach Medical Center for treatment.
The two other shooting victims later turned up at the medical center to be treated.
Anyone with information on the crime is asked to contact OCSO at (850) 651-7400 or Emerald Coast Crime Stoppers at (850) 863-TIPS.
